description: Create Individual Tax summary test data request

pensionsAnnuitiesAndOtherStateBenefits.description: Tax deducted from pensions, annuities and other state benefits.

otherPensionsAndRetirementAnnuities.description: The amount of tax deducted from pensions (other than State Pension), retirement annuities and taxable trivial payments.

taxTakenOffPay.description: The amount of UK tax deducted from pay under this employment.
